language: one elemental language (Aquan, Auran, Ignan, or Terran), one planar language (Abyssal, Celestial, or Infernal); telepathy 100 feet
language_markdown: [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1); one elemental language (Aquan, Auran, Ignan, or Terran), one planar language (Abyssal, Celestial, or Infernal); telepathy 100 feet
markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Janni](/Monsters.aspx?ID=211)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Jann are genies composed of all four elements, meaning they are not quite home on any of the Elemental Planes. Instead, jann reside on the Material Plane, making only brief forays to the other parts of the Inner Sphere. Although they are human in size and appearance, jann are not at all related to humans and bristle at any claims to this effect. They are a proud people and take great care to maintain their honor—restoring that honor with the edge of a sword, if necessary.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Janni](/Monsters.aspx?ID=211)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=57" />
<trait label="Genie" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=216" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 162</row>

**Perception** +11; darkvision

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1); one elemental language (Aquan, Auran, Ignan, or Terran), one planar language (Abyssal, Celestial, or Infernal); telepathy 100 feet

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +10, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +8, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +7, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +2

**Con** +2

**Int** +2

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=38), [Composite Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75) (20 arrows)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +12 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +11 

</row>

**HP** 60

**Resistances**
fire 5

**Elemental Endurance** A janni can survive on any Elemental Plane for up to 48 hours, after which it takes 1 damage per hour until it leaves or dies.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, fly 15 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
scimitar +14 ([forceful +1](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 1d6+10 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +14 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d4+10 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
composite shortbow +12 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+5 piercing

**Arcane Innate Spells** DC 21
- **1st**
[Create Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=53)
- **2nd**
[Create Food](/Spells.aspx?ID=52), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (x3), [Speak with Animals](/Spells.aspx?ID=293)
- **7th**
[Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) (to Astral Plane, Elemental Planes, or Material Plane only)

**Change Size** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) **Frequency** Once per day. **Effect** The janni changes a creature’s size. This works as a 4th-level [_enlarge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=102) or [_shrink_](/Spells.aspx?ID=284) spell but can target an unwilling creature (DC 21 Fortitude save negates).

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="">Janni Amirs</title>

Janni amirs can’t grant wishes. They add the following to their innate spells: **4th** [_read omens_](/Spells.aspx?ID=247); **Cantrips (4th)** [_detect magic_ (at will)](/Spells.aspx?ID=66).
</aside>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-50" />
name: Janni
